name: army
description: In the annals of history, the armies of ancient times stand as monumental pillars of human civilization's progression and warfare's evolution. From the disciplined legions of Rome to the formidable phalanxes of Greece, and the nomadic cavalry hordes of the Eurasian steppes, these armies shaped the course of empires and the fate of nations. Armed with spears, swords, bows, and innovative tactics.
